document.full_text: "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides" doesn't hit u.s. theaters until may 20. but screenwriter terry rossio has just turned in his script for a planned fifth installment in disney's most lucrative film franchise.
document.title: "pirates 5" written, but johnny depp wants delay
lines_and_colors: "pirates of the caribbean: on stranger tides" doesn't hit u.s. theaters until may 20. but screenwriter terry rossio has just turned in his script for a planned fifth installment in disney's most lucrative film franchise.
